meanings.definition: Not experienced with pleasure or satisfaction.
meanings.sent1: The unenjoyed movie left me feeling bored.
meanings.sent2: She unenjoyed the taste of the bitter medicine.
meanings.sent3: The unenjoyed picnic was rained out, adding to the disappointment.
meanings.sent4: His unenjoyed expression spoke volumes about his dissatisfaction.
meanings.sent5: The unenjoyed roller coaster ride was a letdown for the thrill-seekers.

meanings.sent1: The unenjoyed book was quickly put back on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: He unenjoyed the company of his rude coworker.
meanings.sent3: The unenjoyed joke fell flat, leaving everyone silent.
meanings.sent4: Her unenjoyed vacation photos made her long for a better trip.
meanings.sent5: The unenjoyed concert made the audience wish they had chosen a different event.
